name: Quiz Making Software
short_description: Quiz making software, this software allows admins to create questions and answers. Users site the test or quiz and then the admin can scroll through the database and check a users score. This software is good for teachers who want to create a test for pupils. They can then scroll through the database and see what pupil, student requires more help based on the score attained. The admin can create user accounts, reset passwords, create other admin accounts. The quiz or test is based on the admin being allowed to set 27 questions. There is a timer which the admin can set which specifies how long the test or quiz should take. There is also a paid version of this software which allows the admin to create 52 questions. The online version will be coming out soon.
